oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John T. Wilder corresondence with Martha Wilder, 1861 October 25
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from J. T. Wilder to his wife, Martha, describing Union troop movements immediately following the Battle of Cheat Mountain as well as his application for a furlough to visit home.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865
Dumont, Ebenezer, 1814-1871; Hascall, Julia A.; Hascall, Milo Smith, 1829-1904; Milroy, Robert Huston, 1816-1890; Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:spatial: Cheat Mountain (W. Va.); Huttonsville (W. Va.); Lawrenceburg (Ind.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: John T. Wilder correspondence with Martha Wilder, 1861-1865
